name: You're A Loop
description:
A game made in 48h for the Ludum Dare 47 : Stuck in a loop

You're a loop. 

Flow with it. Draw with it. Let it go and play all you want.

Control : 
Left click/Space bar : change direction of the flow
Right click/down arrow/up arrow/scroll wheel : change size of the flow
Escape : quit the game

(the final product is more a toy than a game, but there is an end, as there is 4 collectibles discard on the canvas. Have fun trying to reach them !)

All visual asset made by Horace Ribout (me).
Sound effect use are royalty free sounds, mix and sample by me. (List of the source coming soon).

Software use : Unity, MyBox plug in for Unity, Audacity, Gimp.

https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/47/youre-a-loop
